name: Santa's Busy Day
overview: Santa's Busy Day is a somewhat primitive Pac-Man style game for the Commodore 64. However in this game, instead of playing the typical Pac-Man character, you play as Santa Claus trying to save Christmas. This game was developed by George Trepal and was originally published in the December 1985 issue of Ahoy! magazine. It was also published in 2004 in GO64! 2004/12.
